front.title: SDP General Purpose Media Descriptors for H.261 and H.263

abstract.t: This document defines new SDP parameters using general purpose mediadescriptors to describe video codecs used in interactive multimediaapplications. Currently this document covers H.261 and H.263 but morecodecs are expected to leverage the SDP syntax defined by thisdocument. These parameters aid in negotiating parameters for videosessions. Examples of using the SDP video syntax to setup a videocall using the SDP offer answer model are included.
